mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_courses (s_id, c_no, cart_date) VALUES(#{sId}, #{courses.cNo}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart_courses WHERE s_id=#{sId} AND c_no=#{courses.cNo}
DELETE FROM cart_courses WHERE cart_date < now()
mapper.select: SELECT ccc.s_id, ccc.cart_date, c.* FROM cart_courses ccc inner join course c on ccc.c_no = c.c_no WHERE ccc.s_id=#{sId} order by ccc.s_id, ccc.cart_date
